...不代替物(res non fungibiles，goods which are not fungible)为交易上注重物之个性，而不能以同种类、品质及数量的其他物代替之物，不替代物并不能作为消费借贷及消费寄托契约的标的物王泽鉴，《民法总则》，页228，2010年4月，与代替物相对，如土地、房屋及艺术品页129.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from medieval Latin fungibilis, from fungi 'perform, enjoy', with the same sense as fungi vice 'serve in place of'

means.word_mean: 1. a commodity that is freely interchangeable with another in satisfying an obligation
1. of goods or commodities; freely exchangeable for or replaceable by another of like nature or kind in the satisfaction of an obligation
